title: Trip Attack
content:
Trip Attack Effect Spend a superiority die to make an attack that deals an additional 1d8 damage and possibly knocks the target Prone. The target must be Large or smaller. Requirements Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass)Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.
